name: Hiryū no Ken Retsuden GB
overview: Year 200X. Ryuhi, the folklore of "Hiryu no Ken," sensed that his master, Gensei, and the "red evil star" were approaching. Originally a clairvoyant, he foresaw that the once-sealed Daimajin would be resurrected when the evil star fell, and entrusted Ryuhi to prevent it. A man dressed in a crimson bodice that reappears in the shadow of a confrontation with the "Five Masters of the Dragon Fang" who are aiming to revive the Great Demon. The purpose of this man! ?? Can Ryuhi prevent the resurrection of the Great Demon! ?? And what is the true identity of Daimajin! ?? The game modes are "action mode" that follows the story, "one-player VS mode" that fights against 12 enemy characters and finally defeats the boss character, and "two-player VS mode" that allows you to play against each other using a communication cable. You can get the FC version "Hiryu no Ken III" for the first time only.
